dt-api.name: select.toggleable()
dt-api.summary: Get / set the behaviour if items can be deselected when a selected item is clicked on

type.returns: `true` if the item can be deselected when clicked on, `false` if it cannot be.
type.description: Get the toggle state of Select for the given DataTable.

type.parameter: `true` to allow item deselection, `false` to disallow.
type.description: Set the toggle state of Select for the DataTable.

dt-api.description: This method provides the ability to allow the end user to deselect a previously selected item by clicking on it or not. This can be useful if you wish to ensure there is at least one row selected in the DataTable.
